ARABIC: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ دَآئِبَيْنِ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and He has made the sun and moon subservient to you holding steady to their courses, and He has
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And subjugated the sun and moon for you so that they perform their tasks diligently; and subdued the night and day for your service.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Who subjected for you the sun and the moon and both of them are constant on their courses, Who subjected for you the night and the day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He made the sun and moon, each following its course, and the day and the night all subservient to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And subjected the sun and the moon for you, which are constantly moving; and has subjected the night and the day for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And He has made the sun and the moon, both constantly pursuing their courses, to be of service to you; and He has made the night and the day to be of service to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And He has made subservient to you the sun and the moon pursuing their courses, and He has made subservient to you the night and the day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and He subjected to you the sun and moon constant upon their courses, and He subjected to you the night and day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And maketh the sun and the moon, constant in their courses, to be of service unto you, and hath made of service unto you the night and the day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He has also subjected to you the sun and the moon, both steadfastly pursuing their courses. He has subjected to you the night as well as the day;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And He hath subjected for you the sun and the moon, two constant toils; and He hath subjected for you the night and the day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He disposed the sun and the moon for you, constant [in their courses], and He disposed the night and the day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And He hath made subject to you the sun and the moon, both diligently pursuing their courses; and the night and the day hath he (also) made subject to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And He has made the sun and the moon, both constantly pursuing their courses, to be of service to you; and He has made the night and the day, to be of service to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and He subjected to you the sun and the moon, which are constant in their courses. And, He has subjected to you the night and the day, and gave you all that you asked of Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And He committed the sun and the moon to your service, both continuously pursuing their courses, and He committed the night and the day to your service.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And He subjected for you the sun and the moon, continuous [in orbit], and subjected for you the night and the day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [14:33] And He has disposed for you the sun and the moon, constant, moving in their courses without pause; and He has disposed for you the night, that you may rest therein, and the day, that you may seek of His bounty therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And maketh the sun and the moon, constant in their courses) until the Day of Judgement, (to be of service unto you) subservient to you, (and hath made of service) and made subservient (unto you the night and the day) which come and go.
